author: Heather Burvan

review: Love the Fire TV - I got one for my husband who hates anything new - but after getting this set up he is really very happy with it.  It was very easy to set up, and it works well and delivers almost anything he wants to watch.  We put the Fire TV in our upstairs  bedroom so my husband could have a second TV there.  We didn't want to have to run another cable upstairs, so this was perfect.  Our wireless is downstairs and we have never had an issue with the wireless.My husband likes it so much that I ended up getting another Fire TV for our daughter's room!~
